abstract: Creates an object from the opacity property of an existing physically based material.
overview:
## Discussion

This initializer creates a new object by copying values from an existing physically based material’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PhysicallyBasedMaterial/blending-swift.property] property. All of the copied values, including [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Opacity/scale], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Opacity/texture], and [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/opacityThreshold] are available to the material’s surface shader function, but RealityKit draws the entity fully opaque unless the surface shader function calls `params.surface().set_opacity()`.
